metadata:
Joseph joseph It's in the Cards! Joseph has unlocked the hidden secrets of the Arcana...
Joseph is a fully featured Character addon MOD compatible with fresh save files to spice up Isaac's journey into the Unknown Depths Below...
[h1] Featuring: [/h1] [list] [*] The new Unlockable Character: Joseph. [*] 44+ New effects for each Tarot Card which Joseph can enchant himself with. [*] 10+ Unlockable Items. [*] 2+ Unlockable Trinkets. [*] A new Tarot Card pulled from a parallel deck. 1.0
